SELECT g.owner, g.name, g.created_time as createdTime, g.updated_time as updatedTime, g.display_name as displayName, g.manager, g.contact_email as contactEmail, g.type, g.parent_id as parentId, g.is_top_group as isTopGroup, g.title, g.key FROM ${databaseName}.`group` g WHERE g.is_enabled = 1
AND g.owner = #{owner}
AND ( g.display_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR g.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY g.created_time DESC LIMIT 1000
